emuInput.TitMainTitle: Portrait of Alma Thoms wearing two piece floral bathing suit, posed on swimming pool ladder at Ammon Recreation Center
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 29, 1946, pg. 21 reads: "Hold It! - And that's just what Alma Thoms did when the photographer caught her on the steps at Ammon Pool. One of the early birds out to get in some swimming licks before the popular Bedford Avenue pool is opened for the summer.  Miss Thoms makes not only a good ad for swimsuits but is a good reason why swimming is good exercise - Harris photo."
